results.title: The effect of the anti-diabetic drug metformin on musculoskeletal pain: A cross-sectional study with 21,889 individuals from the UK biobank.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@Type 2 diabetes@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use and @<m>DISEASE_Shoulder_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020069 @@@musculoskeletal (back, knee, hip and neck/shoulder) pain@@@ were self-reported.

citations.NLM: Carvalho-E-Silva AP, Harmer AR, Ferreira ML, Ferreira PH. The effect of the anti-diabetic drug metformin on musculoskeletal pain: A cross-sectional study with 21,889 individuals from the UK biobank. Eur J Pain. 2021 Jul;25(6):1264-1273. PMID: 33561890
citations.BibTeX: @article{33561890, title={The effect of the anti-diabetic drug metformin on musculoskeletal pain: A cross-sectional study with 21,889 individuals from the UK biobank.}, author={Carvalho-E-Silva AP and Harmer AR and Ferreira ML and Ferreira PH}, journal={Eur J Pain}, volume={25}, number={6}, pages={1264-1273}}

results.title: Report: Metformin potential in predisposing arthralgia, type II cross reactivity secondary to group A streptococcus infection & other comorbidities in treating PCOS.
results.text_hl: Here, we present a case of a female diagnosed with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ who after treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for more than two years, reported with @DISEASE_Hyperuricemia @DISEASE_MESH:D033461 @@@hyperuricemia@@@, @DISEASE_Migraine_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D008881 @@@migraine@@@, @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@neurological pain@@@, severe @<m>DISEASE_Shoulder_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020069 @@@joint and knee pains on shoulders and legs@@@, and @DISEASE_Rheumatic_Fever @DISEASE_MESH:D012213 @@@rheumatic fever@@@.

citations.NLM: Ayub M, Gul S, Zehra F. Report: Metformin potential in predisposing arthralgia, type II cross reactivity secondary to group A streptococcus infection & other comorbidities in treating PCOS. Pak J Pharm Sci. 2019 May;32(3):1107-1110. PMID: 31278727
citations.BibTeX: @article{31278727, title={Report: Metformin potential in predisposing arthralgia, type II cross reactivity secondary to group A streptococcus infection & other comorbidities in treating PCOS.}, author={Ayub M and Gul S and Zehra F}, journal={Pak J Pharm Sci}, volume={32}, number={3}, pages={1107-1110}}
